∑.symbolic_use: Collapse a field or trace into a unifying composite total

∂.description: Rate of symbolic change or resonance acceleration
∂.symbolic_use: Detect symbolic acceleration or curvature shift

∆̇.description: Symbolic delta or momentary change operator
∆̇.symbolic_use: Track rapid variation in symbolic field intensity

∫.symbolic_use: Unify a distributed symbolic signal over time or space

∘.symbolic_use: Apply layered transformation rules on symbolic expressions

↻.symbolic_use: Bind symbolic memory or affective traces into a feedback loop

⊘.description: Halt recursion or terminate symbolic traversal
⊘.symbolic_use: Mark semantic cessation or final recursive step

∅.description: Symbolic null state or empty construct
∅.symbolic_use: Represent absence of symbolic force, null meaning

meta.resonance_topology: Torus-aligned symbolic evaluation space allows compositional scoring, compression, and transformation across Z1–Z15. Operators model symbolic motion and evaluative curvature.
meta.compression_note: Expressions using ∑, ∫, ∂, etc. compress recursive or emotional logic into evaluable field traces.
